channel.title: Docker Quick Recipes on Juan Antonio Estival - Solutions Architect
channel.description: Recent content in Docker Quick Recipes on Juan Antonio Estival - Solutions Architect

item.title: PostgreSQL
item.description: Recall //list all images docker image ls docker ps //shows runing containers docker container ls //shows all containers docker container ls -a Install psql client brew install postgresql Create a docker container with a yaml file touch docker-compose.yml Edit version: "3" services: db: image: postgres restart: unless-stopped container_name: "my_postgres" ports: - "5432:5432" environment: POSTGRES_USER: postgres POSTGRES_PASSWORD: SuperSecret!23 volumes: - .
